item.description:
http://www.ticketmast...

$20 per ticket plus taxes and service charges.
MUST PURCHASE YOUR OWN TICKET WHEN YOU RSVP.

I haven't purchased my ticket yet but will if I have some friends to join.

This is not reserved seating. Cabaret style or standing room only first come first serve.

It's about 30 minute drive. May meet somewhere in PVD to eat and then carpool up there.

UPDATE:
Meeting for dinner if you'd like to join at PEARL around 5:45. They have a sushi special starting 7/21 that starts at 5:30 during the week. Can sit outside on their beautiful patio and head out to the concert from there. The concert 'starts' at 8pm and is a standing room only venue. I'm sure if we leave around 7pm we'll be good. Everyone is responsible for their own tix. There may be a few add'l people joining who are not involved in meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Let's carpool. Will notify RSVPers closer to the event.
item.name: Gin Blossoms at Showcase Live in Foxboro
